title: Banoffee cheesecake with ginger crumb, caramelised bananas and banana tarte tatin
description: Go bananas with this triple-decker dessert. It looks very fancy but if you buy the puff pastry it can be ready in an hour.
ingredients: 225g/8oz tinned caramel or dulce de leche
2 large bananas, peeled and cut into chunks
250g/9oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
275g/9¾oz cold butter, cut into small cubes
